divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing outside and I saw in the sky a small orange spot. It flickered as a flame as it moved from one point in the sky to the other. It then flickered out. There was no associated sound that I as able to hear and there was no visible contrail. The best guess I could manage would be that it was the tailfire of a rocket. It was very strange. I also had my co-workers come out of the office and observe the object, which they did.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Charleston
There were no other sightings in Charleston on or around March 21st 2011
Summary: orange round flame moved steadily across the sky at an even pace.
